tool.summary: Adds fields that describe a polygon shape's relationship to its minimum bounding rectangle. The contents of these fields supports queries for determining how to label these features and for how to select these features for generalization.
tool.usage:
The fields added are:

  • HullWidth: length of shortest axis

  • HullLength: length of longest axis

  • L2WRatio: ratio of HullLength to HullWidth (tells whether the input polygon is relatively compact or long)

  • MBRArea: percentage of the MBR's area that the original shape occupies (tells whether the input polygon is relatively substantial)

  • PartCount: just for quality assurance purposes, ideally the shapes should be single part--use the Multipart to singlepart tool if values greater than 1 appear in this column.

  • MBRBearing: bearing of the longest side of the polygon's minimum bounding rectangle. Measured clockwise from north (0 degrees).
